remarks: Elementhood in the base set of the loop space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jul-2015.)
statement:
pi1val.g $e |- G = ( J pi1 Y ) $.
pi1val.1 $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
pi1val.2 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. X ) $.
pi1bas2.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` G ) ) $.
pi1eluni $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. U. B <-> ( F e. ( II Cn J ) /\ ( F ` 0 ) = Y /\ ( F ` 1 ) = Y ) ) ) $.
